# Ubiquity Rewards (pay.ubq.fi)



**Ubiquity Rewards** (aka [pay.ubq.fi](https://pay.ubq.fi)) (view a [test claim link](https://pay.ubq.fi/?))  is the central payment platform within **UbiquityOS**, designed to allow contributors to seamlessly collect rewards for their contributions to projects in the Ubiquity network.

<figure><img src="https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXdUJ7N1eJHxxYCU9N1i3hsO42Zqtibc6WyBD8bglIh6rp9Mp6jocr4q4PiACCMzjMEvEvQK-b-QrrPo59V__izFunXARAY4aZwHHvWi2_UBuOJWa6TJ8Kcq7V8uSYc7Afpl_9H2yPumUH8KDmbe?key=uVdgcFbZEA3fqFCkIBZ30A" alt=""><figcaption></figcaption></figure>

The platform supports distributing ERC20-compliant tokens directly to contributors' crypto wallets as rewards. Additionally, contributors have the option to receive unique NFT rewards as recognition for their work. The platform features a user-friendly interface that makes it easy for contributors to quickly and efficiently claim their payments. To ensure a smooth onboarding experience, simple test claim links are available to help contributors understand the claiming process.

\
